item.title: Drain Cleaning Tips Every Charlotte Homeowner Should Know

item.title: How to Unclog a Drain in Your Charlotte Home
item.description:
Is your sink draining slowly? Here’s how to fix it before you need a pro.

  1. Pour boiling water…
  2. Use a plunger…
  3. Try baking soda and vinegar…

If nothing works, contact Charlotte Plumbing Pros at (704) 555-1234.
